page.title: 08COMMUNITY PROJECTS IN DOVER.
page.content: A "LOLLIPOP MAN" (A PERSON WHO SEES CHILDREN ACROSS THE ROAD FROM SCHOOL,COLLECTED MONEY TO START A 'BMX' TRACK FOR YOUNGSTERS IN THIS AREA.HE BOUGHT A PIECE OF WASTE LAND AND ASKED THE ARMY IF THEY COULD BUILD IT.THE ROYAL ENGINEERS BUILT IT WITH BULLDOZERS AND DIGGERS.THERE ARE JUMPS AND 'KILLER WHOOPS' AND THE SIDES OF THE TRACK ARE LINED WITH OLD CAR TYRES. UNFORTUNATELY IT HAS BEEN VANDALISED,THE TYRES BEING BURNED AND BOTTLES HAVE BEEN SMASHED ON THE TRACK. THE TRACK IS NOT USED NOW DUE TO THE VANDALISATION.
